title: NIAB Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Senior Research Fellow, Senior Project Assistant Posts
description: The National Institute of Animal Biotechnology(NIAB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Senior Research Fellow, Senior Project Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, M.Sc., Any Degree, MBA can apply for the NIAB Notification 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the edu...
